snippet: After tough negotiations, a group of eight senators planned to introduce a proposal on Tuesday that contains a 13-year pathway to citizenship for immigrants here illegally.
abstract: Sweeping immigration bill from bipartisan group of eight senators seeks to fix chronic problems in system and bring estimated 11 million illegal immigrants to right side of law; would also reorient future immigration with goal of bringing foreigners to country based increasingly on job skills and personal assets they can offer.
lead_paragraph: After tough negotiations, a group of eight senators planned to introduce a proposal on Tuesday that contains a 13-year pathway to citizenship for immigrants here illegally.

headline.seo: Besides a Path to Citizenship, a New Course for Immigration
headline.main: Beside a Path to Citizenship, a New Path on Immigration
headline.print_headline: Beside a Path to Citizenship, a New Course for Immigration
